author: Sephiko

text: It was also a really awesome fight, of course. XD Hard (probably the hardest in the game, given your limited equipment) but manageable.
author: Babybahamut

text: Oh, I loved this one when I heard it in game. Quite a dark theme, you can imagine how Samus is feeling- knowing that she's fighting someone on her side, but also knowing that if she doesn't kill him, he will kill her instead. A hard choice, echoed wonderfully in this theme. It keeps a tempo just high enough to keep the battle pumping but melancholy and sad enough to speak more than words could.
author: Babybahamut

text: I know I'll probably be thumbed down for this, but I've never seen the big deal about this tune. Gandrayda's theme is better. Then again, I've never been a big fan of Kenji Yamamoto's "Metroid Prime sound".
